name: SH Email Alert
author: Sam Hoe

sections.description: Email Alert subscribe form. You can manage through the admin pages of your blog. Simple put the shortcode ‘[sh_email_alert_form]’ into your page or post.
sections.installation:
Installing the SH Slideshow plugin is quick and simple:

  1. Begin by downloading the plugin file (ZIP)
  2. Extract the files to your local machine
  3. Upload the whole sh-email-alert folder (including the folder itself) to your plugins directory – typically http://www.yourdomain.com/wp-content/plugins/
  4. Activate the plugin using your WordPress admin pages
  5. Add the form code to your theme
sections.faq:
How do I add subscribe form to my website?

Simply put the shortcode ‘[sh_email_alert_form]’ into your page or post editor.

Do you have questions or issues with SH Email Alert?

Please email to samhoamt@gmail.com.

upgrade_notice: The required WordPress version 2.9 or higher. If you use WordPress 2.8, you will need to upgrade WordPress.
